name: Angelo's big Adventure
description:
This game was made during the course of the 2021 Path of the Developer Game Jam.

You play a human boy who has to rearrange a grid of objects to allow the little alien ball Angelo to push the button at the end of the level to activate his crashed ships teleporter. Unfortunately the crash partly destroyed it and now the teleporter moves him to random places.

Help Angelo get back to his ship.

The game was made using the Unity version 2019.4.19f1

Programming:  Chris Petit
Music:  Ben McQuaile
Models and Visual Assets: Laryana Apel,  Lorène Collin, Alexandre Lazare Lyon
                                                   

With Left shift you can move the camera quicker.
You move the camera with WASD.
To move objects click and hold them. To rotate them rotate the mouse wheel while holding.
Springs light up green when hovered over, normal platforms red.
